title: Foundational Course for Teacher Professional Development Utilizing Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course exploring the latest trends in teacher competency development by combining face-to-face workshops and online modules, including practical topics such as ICT-integrated education, instructional design, and promoting educational equity.

learning_goals: Describe three core elements of teacher professional development in blended learning environments
Develop actual lesson scenarios by applying an instructional design framework utilizing ICT tools
Analyze and present blended learning strategies for promoting educational equity through case studies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
